title: (x) Matrix logo techno sans - FF Max {Rainer}
content:
Can Anyone help with the typeface used to create this?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015901im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/matrix_6162.jpg)

 [‹ (x) angular italic serif "Thank you" - Freight Micro {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015901/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34458 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Let's Build Something Together™ tech sans - DIN 1451 Mittelschrift {Florian Hardwig, Jan E} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015901/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34449 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Aether

comments.content:
You would have to customize Dax quite a bit to get to this result.  
Would be easier to draw the thing from scratch.

Ähm, Jan, we are talking about FF MAX not FF Dax …

With Max you’ll have to customize just the l/c x.

_or am I wrong-threading again ;^D_
To prove Renko’s point, here’s [a custom sample of FF Max](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015901/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_max_regular/&sample_text=matrix&sample_size=96).
